summary.span: 提供建立和排程 物件的支援。

span.span: Provides support for creating and scheduling objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 會提供建立和排程工作的兩個處理站：The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks: - 類別，這會建立和物件。The class, which creates and objects. - 類別，這會建立物件。The class, which creates objects. 類別可讓您執行下列動作：The class allows you to do the following: - 建立工作並立即開始藉由呼叫方法。Create a task and start it immediately by calling the method. 您可以呼叫此方法來建立和執行的工作需要非預設引數的多載。You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments. > [!WARNING] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則方法提供最簡單的方式，使用預設組態值建立工作並立即加以啟動。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 建立工作，藉由呼叫其中一個陣列中的工作完成時，會啟動或方法。Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the or method. - 建立時在陣列中的所有工作都完成藉由呼叫啟動工作或方法。Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the or method. 靜態屬性會傳回預設值物件。The static property returns a default object. 您也可以呼叫其中一個類別建構函式來設定物件類別會建立。You can also call one of the class constructors to configure the objects that the class creates. 下列範例會設定新物件來建立具有指定的取消語彙基元、 工作建立選項、 接續選項和自訂的工作排程器工作。The following example configures a new object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler. [!code-csharp[TPL_Factories#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/cs/factoriestresult.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPL_Factories#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/vb/factoriestresult.vb#2)] 在大部分情況下，您就不必具現化新執行個體。In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new instance. 相反地，您可以使用靜態屬性，會傳回 factory 物件，會使用預設值。Instead, you can use the static property, which returns a factory object that uses default values. 然後，您可以呼叫其方法來啟動新的工作，或定義工作接續。You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations. 如需圖例，請參閱範例。For an illustration, see the example. ## Examples 下列範例會使用靜態屬性，以便在兩個呼叫方法。The following example uses the static property to make two calls to the method. 第一項工作會傳回字串陣列，而第二個則會傳回字串陣列，其中會填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄之子目錄的名稱填入使用者的 MyDocuments 目錄中的檔案名稱。The first task returns a string array that is populated with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second returns a string array that is populated with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory. 然後它會呼叫方法，這個對話方塊會顯示兩個工作完成執行之後傳回的陣列數目的檔案和目錄的相關資訊。It then calls the method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the arrays returned by the two tasks after they have completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/cs/factory2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/vb/factory2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫`StartNew`相當於使用其中一種建立工作建構函式，然後呼叫排程執行的方法。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the constructors, and then calling the method to schedule it for execution. 不過，除非您建立和排程必須分隔，`StartNew`是為了簡化和效能的建議的方法。However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫`StartNew`相當於使用其中一種建立工作建構函式，然後呼叫排程執行的方法。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the constructors and then calling the method to schedule it for execution. 不過，除非您建立和排程必須分隔，`StartNew`是為了簡化和效能的建議的方法。However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.
